00012 <?php
00013         $releases = $this->releases;
00014         foreach ($releases as $release)
00015         {
00016                 $release->belongs_to('softwares');
00017                 $software = $release->software;
00018 ?>
00019                 <item>
00020                         <title><?php echo utf8_encode($software->title); ?> <?php echo $release->version; ?></title>
00021                         <guid isPermaLink="true"><?php echo $software->permalink(FALSE); ?></guid>
00022                         <link><?php echo $software->permalink(FALSE); ?></link>
00023                         <description>
00024                                 <![CDATA[
00025                                 <p><?php echo utf8_encode($software->description); ?></p>
00026 <?php
00027                 if (!empty($release->changes))
00028                 {
00029 ?>
00030                                 <h3>What&rsquo;s new in version <?php echo $release->version; ?>?</h3>
00031                                 <ul>
00032 <?php
00033                                 $changes = explode("\r\n", $release->changes);
00034                                 foreach ($changes as $change)
00035                                 {
00036 ?>
00037                                         <li><?php echo utf8_encode(h($change)); ?></li>
00038 <?php
00039                                 }
00040 ?>
00041                                 </ul>
00042 <?php
00043                 }
00044 ?>
00045                                 <p>
00046                                         <a href="<?php echo $software->permalink(FALSE); ?>"><?php echo $software->title; ?></a> |
00047 <?php
00048                 switch ($software->license)
00049                 {
00050                         case "shareware":
00051                         case "commercial":
00052 ?>
00053                                         <?php echo a(l('Register'), array('href' => $software->registration_permalink(FALSE))); ?> |
00054 <?php
00055                                 break;
00056                         default:
00057 ?>
00058                                         <?php echo a(l('Donate'), array('href' => $software->donate_permalink(FALSE))); ?> |
00059 <?php
00060                                 break;
00061                 }
00062 ?>
00063                                         <?php echo a(l('Comments'), array('href' => $software->comments_permalink(FALSE))); ?>
00064                                 </p>
00065                         ]]>
00066                         </description>
00067 <?php
00068                 $release->has_many('software_artifacts');
00069                 $artifacts = $release->software_artifacts;
00070                 if (count($artifacts) > 0)
00071                 {
00072                         foreach ($artifacts as $artifact)
00073                         {
00074                                 if (!$artifact->enabled ||
00075                                         !$artifact->visible)
00076                                 {
00077                                         continue;
00078                                 }
00079                                 $artifact->release = $release;
00080                                 $this->render(array('partial' => 'artifact', 'object' => $artifact));
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083 ?>
00084                         <pubDate><?php echo $release->rfc2822_date(); ?></pubDate>
00085                 </item>
00086 <?php
00087         }
00088 ?>
